                                    java.lang.String destination,
                                    java.lang.String messageId,

        Create an InboundMessage object having the specified text.
        Parameters:
        sender - the sender address
        destination - the destination address
        messageId - the message ID
        message - the message text
        timestamp - the timestamp of the message
        Returns:
        the InboundMessage object

      • createConversation

        Conversation createConversation(java.lang.String participant,
                                java.lang.String localAddress)
        Create a new Conversation object
        Parameters:
        participant - the remote participant for the conversation
        localAddress - one of the local addresses which are assigned to user, to be user within this conversation
        Returns:
        the Conversation object

      • fetchConversations

        void fetchConversations(FetchCriteria criteria,
                        FetchCallback<java.util.List<Conversation>> callback)
        Retrieve all conversations from the server into local memory. These conversations can then be retrieved using getConversation().
        Parameters:
        criteria - criteria contains participant,local address and fetch options for path and parameters
        callback - a callback function to the calling application

      • fetchConversations
